thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 21 of 539
thread.title: Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: This is the 4th dress I have bought from this site and ALL OF THEM WERE PERFECT AND BEAUTIFUL This is one site that you do not need to be afraid of what you will be getting, they are legit and have beautiful dresses. What is in the picture is EXACTLY what you will receive in the mail. AAAA++++ Will be back again in the future!!!! Thank you for always making our dress shopping an easy experience.
